title: Client Randomly stopped working in the past 12 hours. Have re-installed twice now
body:
I have re-installed the game two different times now and still getting nowhere with a result. The first error message I got was something along the lines of "RADS error/picture" and was told to reinstall. I uninstall, then have reinstalled again two different times with the same error message  popping up saying "league of legends has encountered a problem please reinstall". This is patch 0.58.0.205    / 6.4  PLEASE get back with me ASAP, as I am done with finals & looking forward to my Poro King adventures.

**Now on my fourth reinstall with the same error messages.....**

replies.body: A setting with your PC may have changed that's no longer allowing the client to launch.  Go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get back in.  Let me know if you have any questions on this!

I believe it has something to do with the open beta. I have not done any changes to pc. Plus, it brings up the option to update the client/beta and once I click yes the game crashes immediately with that message. I had the open beta installed before and never had these problems, I was literally playing til 6am this morning and got on at about 10:30am and this problem arose.
